books.author: by James Patterson and Howard Roughan
books.description: As he investigates the murder of a pair of newlyweds, the F.B.I. agent John O’Hara, last seen in “Honeymoon” (2005), is targeted by a serial killer.
books.name: SECOND HONEYMOON

books.author: by H. M. Ward
books.description: Sidney wants to set things right with her family, but she doesn’t realize she’s dragging Peter into a collision course with his past.
books.name: DAMAGED 2

books.author: by Dan Brown
books.description: The symbologist Robert Langdon, on the run in Florence, must decipher a series of codes created by a Dante-loving scientist.
books.name: INFERNO

books.author: by Robyn Carr
books.description: Mac McCain, a single father and Thunder Point’s deputy sheriff, has finally found happiness with a longtime friend. But his life is thrown into chaos when his ex-wife returns.
books.name: THE NEWCOMER

books.author: by Khaled Hosseini
books.description: A multigenerational family saga centers on a brother and sister born in Afghanistan.
books.name: AND THE MOUNTAINS ECHOED

books.author: by Elin Hilderbrand
books.description: Various sorts of disaster threaten a Nantucket wedding.
books.name: BEAUTIFUL DAY

books.author: by Max Brooks
books.description: An “oral history” of an imagined Zombie War that nearly destroys civilization.
books.name: WORLD WAR Z

books.author: by James Rollins
books.description: As the end of the world looms, Cmdr. Gray Pierce and Sigma Force race to uncover an ancient mystery.
books.name: THE EYE OF GOD

books.author: by Susan Mallery
books.description: In Fool’s Gold, Calif., two misfits — Felicia and the former military operative Gideon — discover that passion isn’t the only thing they have in common.
books.name: TWO OF A KIND

books.author: by Sylvia Day
books.description: Eva and Gideon face the demons of their pasts and accept the consequences of their obsessive desires; a Crossfire novel.
books.name: ENTWINED WITH YOU

books.author: by Neil Gaiman
books.description: A middle-aged man recalls his lonely boyhood and his friendship with a remarkable girl.
books.name: THE OCEAN AT THE END OF THE LANE

books.author: by Maya Banks
books.description: Steele, a team leader in an elite task force, is determined not to allow Maren past his icy exterior. But when she’s in danger, there’s no way he’ll allow anyone else to protect her.
books.name: FORGED IN STEELE

books.author: by J.C. Reed
books.description: Brooke Stewart, a New Yorker who avoids relationships, embarks on an affair with Jeff Mayfield, a millionaire playboy.
books.name: SURRENDER YOUR LOVE

books.author: by Carl Hiaasen
books.description: A defrocked Miami cop turned restaurant inspector investigates a grisly murder.
books.name: BAD MONKEY

books.author: by Sandra Brown
books.description: A public defender who seems happy in her work and her marriage is plunged into a morass of bigotry and hate.
books.name: THE WITNESS
